definition: to walk (side part of split character)
year after year/with each passing year/over the years
to banish/to deport/to send into exile/to be marooned
to pursue deer/fig. to vie for supremacy

sentences.english: The huts darkled away into the gloom of the field.
sentences.chinese: 那些茅舍逐漸變模糊，融入了一片蒼茫的原野中。

sentences.english: Organic rubbers develop a resinous surface crust through weathering .
sentences.chinese: 有機橡膠經過風蝕後，逐呈現出樹脂狀的外表。

sentences.english: Once-flowing water has flow, everything is by the East.
sentences.chinese: 昔時流水至今流，萬事皆逐東流去。

sentences.english: And he sees the local attitude to laowai (foreigners) changing for the better.
sentences.chinese: 他喜歡這裏的人對老外的態度逐漸變的更好。
逐象素基本要做的複雜操作。

sentences.english: Per-vertex dynamic lighting can add significant cost to vertex transformations.
sentences.chinese: 逐像素的動態光照將對頂點變換增加顯著的開銷。

sentences.english: An adaptive MLSE receiver based on per-survivor processing (PSP) for digital transmissions over high frequency (HF) channels is proposed in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 提出了一種適用於無線時變信道的逐倖存處理均衡器。

sentences.english: We had Van Persie sent off and Fabregas wasn't 100 per cent.
sentences.chinese: 那時范佩西被逐出場，法佈雷加斯又不在狀態。

sentences.english: We also try to improve pathwise estimator in order to reduce standard error.
sentences.chinese: 我們還將嘗試改進逐路徑估計量，以求減小標準誤差。

sentences.english: I'd buy you Rogaine when you start losing all your hair.
sentences.chinese: 如果你逐漸變老，開始落髮，我會幫你買生髮水。

sentences.english: Yanghwa afraid to go by wind, Dazhu railings would not fly.
sentences.chinese: 楊花怕逐東風去，搭住闌干不肯飛。

sentences.english: Below, a myriad myriad waves hastening, lifting up their necks.
sentences.chinese: 俯瞰，浪無數急急忙忙逐，伸頸回眸走。

sentences.english: The detumescence stops pain, dispels chases wet coldly, releases eliminates effect of hotly the poison.
sentences.chinese: 消腫止痛，祛溼逐寒，泄熱除毒之功效。

definition: to relieve oedema through purging or diuresis (Chinese medicine)
to scoop up water with the hands
to hurry forward on an expedition/to drive fast
watchtower on either side of a city gate/(literary) city/imperial palace
deep and somber/see also 窈窈[yao3 yao3]
